features_interior_features: Whirlpool,  Attic Stairs Pulldown,  Wet Bar,  Open Floorplan,  Tray Ceiling,  Walk-In Closet(s),  Kitchen Island,  Vaulted Ceiling,  Built-Ins,  Window Treatments

Master Bath is updated w/a frameless shower, & new light fixtures and has a whirlpool tub.  2nd Floor has Loft area, PLUS a bonus/billiards room and three additional bedrooms- perfect family layout! Beautiful home that shows like a model! Beautiful floors, granite counter-tops in kitchen, stainless steel appliances, fresh paint and carpet. Open concept kitchen/family room with fireplace. Master on main level, 2 spacious bedrooms and loft on 2nd level. Neighborhood pool. Convenient to I-485 and 85. Minutes from Concord Mills Mall and UNCC. Show and Sell!
Corner lot with fenced yard; open floor plan with upstairs loft, large kitchen open to family room

features_interior_features: Breakfast Bar,  Cable Available,  Built-Ins,  Split BR Plan
features_desc: The AVENUE is a 425 feet tall condominium tower. It was completed in 2007 and has 35 floors and has 6,700 square feet of retail at street level. This corner unit is on the 26th floor with a panoramic view of the City. Unit features hardwood floors, granite counter tops & stainless steel front appliances, Refrigerator, washer & dryer included. All amenities are located on the 10th floor, which are a fitness center, billiards room, club room, swim pool, outdoor grill & gathering area & media room. Main lobby area features a concierge, business center & mail room. Full size parking spaces #234 & #235 on 7th floor.

Location, Location, location! This corner lot, split level home in HOT Montclaire has mostly hardwood floors and great square footage. 3 bds/1 bath up. Full bath + add'l bdrm down w/separate entrance...great for an in-law unit or tenant. Interior needs your remodel, but priced well under market value to compensate for this. Montclaire is a close-in, established neighborhood full of renovations! Near light rail, shopping, SouthEnd. Quick commute to airport, SouthPark, Uptown. To be sold "as is".

Beautiful updated home in the desirable Montclaire neighborhood.  The painted exterior and front double doors give this home loads of charm.  Hardwoods throughout except for file in the kitchen.  Bedrooms are spacious and bathrooms are updated!  Plenty of space to entertain on the back patio.

features_interior_features: GardenTub,  Pantry,  Walk-In Closet(s),  Kitchen Island,  Window Treatments
features_desc: This builders personal home features 5 bedrooms 3 full baths, in an A location. Beautiful custom trim throughout, cozy masonry fireplace with new gas log set in an over sized den, screened and covered porches, rear deck with fenced yard for pets, dual stairs for great interior flow, wood floors throughout main floor, extra large master bath, two story foyer with built ins, 9' ceilings n first floor, tons of attic storage on third level and over garage. Additional rear bricked patio, mature landscaping. Note also home has second stairway accessing kitchen. This home offers both formal living and a cozy home feel, that lives a lot larger than 3,400 sq/ft. in a great balance of the two. plant a garden, enjoy the back deck. Established neighborhood featuring pool, tennis, basketball courts, club house, walking trails, creek. All you shopping needs are across the street at The Arboretum Plaza. Contact Lance for additional information 704-780-8360. ( owner/agent )

Fabulous Townhouse with lots of extra upgrades. This 3 bed 2.5 bath has townhome offers an extra parking pad Hardwood flooring throughout first floors, granite,  designer backsplash & Ceramic tile on kitchen and powder room *Updated kitchen island with extended bar top *Master bathroom with tile surround shower and tile flooring Master has 2 closets ( 1 walkin & 1 not) *Hall bath on second floor LVP flooring upgraded, oversized patio. Easy access to 485, shopping and restaurants

features_desc: Like new, move in ready! Upgraded everything with the "Craftsman Trim Package".  Upgrades include Stone fireplace, Coffered ceiling in great room; Double glass doors to office; craftsman wainscoting in foyer and dining room; big farmhouse sink in huge kitchen island; double ovens, SS appliances, hardwoods on main, tile in all baths, over sized Master shower w/ marble tile plus big garden tub.  Tray ceiling in Master and vaulted ceiling in bonus/media room. Bonus room used as a media room; with 100" screen and projector.  Walk in attic storage. Open floor plan. White & gray kitchen, light & bright. Located in the Reserve section of Peach Orchard Estates.

Fantastic recently built home off of Rea Rd.  Thoughtful open floor plan.  Tastefully appointed, stylish fixtures and colors, this home is move in ready.  The home backs up to a dedicated natural area, creating a level of privacy that is somewhat hard to find in newer construction.

features_interior_features: Whirlpool,  Storage Unit,  Open Floorplan,  Cable Available,  Walk-In Closet(s),  Built-Ins,  Split BR Plan
features_desc: Charming 3 bed unit, second floor front. Hardwood floors, high end carpet in bedrooms. 10' ceilings, 8' solid paneled doors. Wide wooden plantation shutters. Refrigerator, washer, dryer & microwave remain. Fireplace with gas logs.

Updated brick custom home located on cul-de-sac in Carmel Cove. Great home for entertaining! Large private, fenced backyard with a 36' x 16'  salt water pool. Enjoy the covered outdoor living space including bar and entertainment area.  Large deck off the master suite overlooking yard and pool. The seller has many energy efficient upgrades, see the attachment for complete list. Some features are two high efficiency heat pumps, two high efficiency gas furnaces and 10 solar panels and solar attic fan, Ecobee smart thermostats, high efficiency windows, highest efficiency vinyl garage door. The property has an irrigation system complete with sprinkler heads and drip lines for shrubs and plants. Too much to list, see attachments and virtual tour.

Perfect Investment opportunity! Home needs some TLC. Beautiful Cathedral ceilings. Split bedroom plan. Brick patio off the Great Room. Fenced back yard.  Lender approval required. Only 1 lender involved.  Home sold as is.

features_interior_features: Attic Stairs Pulldown,  Pantry,  Walk-In Closet(s),  Built-Ins
features_desc: Move in Ready, Brick Townhome in desirable Olde Georgetowne is located just minutes from Southpark Mall.    Recently painted throughout including closets and ceilings.  Kitchen features granite countertops and custom tile backsplash. French doors lead to large enclosed outdoor patio with utility closet perfect for storing outdoor items. HOA dues include cable, water, sewer, yard maintenance and amenities including pool, tennis courts, fishing pond and playground. Amenities including green space located within walking distance.

features_interior_features: GardenTub,  Attic Stairs Pulldown,  Open Floorplan,  Pantry,  Walk-In Closet(s),  Kitchen Island
features_desc: This 5 bedroom/3 bath corner lot has been UPGRADED and back on the market.  Hardwoods refinished, granite installed, most carpeting new, painted and landscaped.   Open floor plan, large gourmet kitchen containing 2 ovens, dramatic great room with fireplace, formal living and dining rooms.  Home boasts large Master bedroom with seating area,  central vacuum throughout, speaker system, loft, large driveway to go along with plenty of parking surrounding the home.  Golf course community with pool and tennis courts.   Please see virtual tour.

Second floor unit. Open layout. Completely Renovated, Updated Bathroom,  Granite Counter Tops, New Kitchen Appliances  New Engineered Wood floors. New carpet. Screened in porch. Stone fireplace. Plenty of storage inside the unit and outside. Fridge, and washer/dryer to remain. Large MBR with his/her closets. MBA has large garden tub. Easy access to shopping, dining, and entertainment.Instructions:Lockbox/Key, Showing ServiceDirections:Located in Brandywine on Albemarle Rd... Right on Dockside, then left on Winery Ln.

Enjoy the convenience of this beautiful townhome as it is located only minutes from South Park, Interstates, Restaurants, Uptown and within walking distance to the Light Rail. Nice community with pool, clubhouse, playground and fitness center.  Open flow from Kitchen, Dining and Family Room. Private patio with storage utility closet.  Second level bedrooms get lots of natural light. Neutral carpet and paint. Move in ready!!

Absolutely stunning RANCH on GOLF COURSE in much sought after Falcon Ridge! Front porch welcomes family and friends. Extensive Hardwood Floors. Newer lighting. Formal Dining Room. Efficiently designed Kitchen w/ample cupboards, pantry, granite and tiled backsplash. overlooks spacious Great Room w/gas log fireplace. Welcoming Master Suite w/large walk-in closet, dual sinks, ceramic tile floor and walk-in shower. Private Guest Suite has it's own Bath. Office/Den could be used as a 3rd Bedroom. Screened porch Overlooks professionally landscaped yard w/numerous plantings including a large Japanese Maple, irrigation and a water feature...Breathtaking! HOAs include all the wonderful amenities of Highland Creek as well as lawn care. Shows like a model!

Amazing South Charlotte location with easy access to highways, shopping, dining, and light rail! Must see beautifully maintained condo in Park Walk! Open great room with wood burning fireplace. Great kitchen space with separate dining area. Spacious owner's suite with vaulted ceiling and tons of natural light. Connecting en-suite with granite dual vanities, tons of counter space and storage. Secondary master with its own en-suite! Walk out to your private outside patio, perfect for grilling and entertaining! Just minutes to South Park, Quail Hollow and Ballantyne!
Nice 2 bedroom condo with open floorplan, conveniently located in desirable Kingstree subdivision.  Vaulted ceiling in master bedroom.
